name: Corporate Invaders
description:
DO NOT TRY AND FULL SCREEN THIS, IT BREAKS THE GAME AND I'M TOO LAZY TO FIX IT.

Just another practice game for my friends to try while I'm learning all this stuff.  I'm actually kinda proud of this one, I put a lot more effort into it.   Think I got bogged down w/ making the assets, UI, stuff like that.

Just shoot the invaders, and keep shooting them.  If you kill all of them, another more violent wave will spawn.  Last as long as you can and see what your final score is!
